Rabah Aït Ouyahia bụ onye Algeria-Canada na-eme ihe nkiri. A maara ya nke ọma dịka onye a họpụtara ugboro abụọ na Jutra / Iris maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma, na-enweta nods na 4th Jutra Awards n'afọ 2002 maka Tar Angel (L'Ange de goudron) na 24th Quebec Cinema Awards n'afọ 2022 maka A Revision (Une révision).

Ọ bịara Canada n'afọ 1996 dịka onye gbara ọsọ ndụ site na Agha Obodo Algeria. Ọrụ ndị ọzọ ọ na-eme gụnyere ihe nkiri Montreal, White City (Montréal ville blanche) na Kinship, usoro telivishọn L'Imposteur, na mmepụta nke Bashir Lazhar n'afọ 2017.
